読替える: (よみかえる) - to read a kanji with a different pronunciation; to load (e.g. data on a computer)/to read; {law} to change the language or wording (of a provision, etc.)/to apply a different term
読本: (よみほん) - type of popular literature from the late Edo period
読札: (よみふだ) - cards with words or phrases written on them, used in Japanese karuta games
読物: (よみもの) - reading matter; reading material
読者モデル: (どくしゃモデル) - reader model; amateur model who appears in fashion magazines
読者層: (どくしゃそう) - readership; target audience (of a magazine)
読者数: (どくしゃすう) - reader numbers; number of subscribers (e.g. to a magazine)
読解力: (どっかいりょく) - reading comprehension; ability to read and understand
読話: (どくわ) - lip reading (esp. in context of deaf people); lipreading; speech reading; speechreading
読誦: (どくしょう) - reading aloud; recitation; intoning
読返す: (よみかえす) - to reread; to read again
読飛ばす: (よみとばす) - to skip over (while reading); to skim
誰あろう: (だれあろう) - none other than; ... himself; ... herself
誰かさん: (だれかさん) - (joc)  a certain somebody; you-know-who
誰かれ: (たれかれ) - this or that person; anybody; many people
誰が見ても: (だれがみても) - as anyone can see
誰しも: (だれしも) - (more emphatic than 誰も)  everyone/anyone; no-one (with neg. verb)
誰それ: (だれそれ) - a certain someone; Mr So-and-so
誰だって: (だれだって) - anyone; anybody; everyone; everybody; whoever
誰でも: (だれでも) - anyone; anybody; everyone; everybody; whoever
誰にでも: (だれにでも) - (adv. equivalent of 誰でも)  anyone (used with positive verbs); anybody; everyone; whoever
誰にも: (だれにも) - (adv equivalent of 誰も)  anybody and everybody; with the best of them; as the next fellow
誰にもまして: (だれにもまして) - more than anybody
誰にも増して: (だれにもまして) - more than anybody
誰ひとりとして: (だれひとりとして) - not a single person (with negative verb); no one
誰ひとりも: (だれひとりも) - (with a negative) no-one; nobody
誰も彼も: (だれもかれも) - everyone; one and all
誰一人として: (だれひとりとして) - not a single person (with negative verb); no one
誰一人も: (だれひとりも) - (with a negative) no-one; nobody
誰人: (たれびと) - whichever person (indefinite pronoun); everyone; every person; all
誰何: (すいか) - challenging (an unknown person); asking a person's identity
誰彼: (darekare) - esta ou aquela pessoa, qualquer pessoa, muitas pessoas
誰彼無しに: (だれかれなしに) - to whomever; to anybody at all
誰得: (だれとく) - (abbrevation of 誰が得するんだよ) meaningless; pointless
誰某: (だれそれ) - a certain someone; Mr So-and-so
課: (ka) - seção, aula; seção (em uma organização), divisão, departamento; contador para aulas e capítulos (de um livro)
課す: (かす) - to levy; to charge; to assess; to impose; to assign
課する: (かする) - to levy; to charge; to assess; to impose; to assign
課の仕事: (かのしごと) - job (responsibility) of a section
課外授業: (かがいじゅぎょう) - extracurricular lesson
課徴金減免制度: (かちょうきんげんめんせいど) - {law}  leniency policy; addition to Japan's antitrust law that allows lower fines for the first company involved in a cartel, etc. to admit their involvement
課程博士: (かていはくし) - doctoral degree (e.g. PhD) after completing a course of study
課税標準: (かぜいひょうじゅん) - base of taxation
課税証明書: (かぜいしょうめいしょ) - tax declaration certificate
課金: (kakin) - taxas, cobrança; pagamento por itens em jogos online
課金制御データ: (かきんせいぎょデータ) - billing control data
課金動作有効期間: (かきんどうさゆうこうきかん) - accounting regime
課金情報: (かきんじょうほう) - billing information; accounting information
課長: (かちょう) - section manager; section chief
課長代理: (かちょうだいり) - deputy manager; acting manager; acting section chief
課題: (kadai) - assunto, tema, questão, matéria; dever de casa, tarefa, assunto, tema, questão, matéria; dever de casa, tarefa; tarefa, desafio, problema, questão
課題曲: (かだいきょく) - set piece (of music)
誹り: (そしり) - slander; libel; disparagement; calumny; vilification
誹る: (そしる) - to slander; to libel; to criticize; to criticise
誹諧: (はいかい) - haikai/collective name for haiku, haibun, haiga, senryū, etc.; humorous or vulgar renga poetry
誹謗中傷: (ひぼうちゅうしょう) - (yoji) slander; calumny
